channel.title: Best browser?
channel.description: What's the best internet browser, I'm currently using the newest Mozilla Firefox? It's pretty damn fast, is there anything faster?

item.title: Best browser?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:67, topic:395923”][quote author=Tico link=topic=493109.msg3608041#msg3608041 date=1306287803]
Who brought up religion in the first place? Where on earth was your mind? We’re talking about browsers, not whether or not you can justify your religious beliefs. On topic people. I have been gone for a while but I didn’t think the community was gone to the shits all that much.
[/quote]Comment was made, replies were sent. It’s how conversations work. But it definitely was a mighty large jump in topics, haha.

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=493109.msg3607968#msg3607968 date=1306285724]
I clicked page 4 of this topic and thought I pressed the “gays and bisexuals” topic or the “judgement day” topic. You guys are retards.

Personally, I like firefox. Tried chrome, but then I remembered google is watching. Then again, google is always watching.
[/quote]There’s nothing wrong with Google as a company. In my mind, they’re the most fair and looking-to-do-good company around these days.

A truth for their innovation is in Chrome, anyways. Look at the minimalistic design. Firefox and IE simply stole that because they saw it was getting popular.[/quote]+1 But then again, a simple design is not really something that can claimed to be stolen.

Read full topic

item.title: Best browser?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:65, topic:395923”]Who brought up religion in the first place? Where on earth was your mind? We’re talking about browsers, not whether or not you can justify your religious beliefs. On topic people. I have been gone for a while but I didn’t think the community was gone to the shits all that much.[/quote]Comment was made, replies were sent. It’s how conversations work. But it definitely was a mighty large jump in topics, haha.

[quote=“reyx7, post:64, topic:395923”]I clicked page 4 of this topic and thought I pressed the “gays and bisexuals” topic or the “judgement day” topic. You guys are retards.

Personally, I like firefox. Tried chrome, but then I remembered google is watching. Then again, google is always watching.[/quote]There’s nothing wrong with Google as a company. In my mind, they’re the most fair and looking-to-do-good company around these days.

A truth for their innovation is in Chrome, anyways. Look at the minimalistic design. Firefox and IE simply stole that because they saw it was getting popular.

Read full topic

fuck off with religion you’re too jejune to be referencing it[/quote]

I’m sensing a change of topic arising.[/quote]

Yeah, but I try not to sin. Gay people want there sin to be made okay. No sin should be okay.

Thanks for completely ignoring the /endreligiousdiscussion. He asked a question of why I thought it wasn’t okay and you ended up blowing it up. Nice.

/endreligiousdiscussion

item.title: Best browser?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

First of all, doesn’t anyone here have his own laptop/computer? I mean, my homepage is porn, I don’t have anything to hide. Also, in chrome there is private browsing aswell so I don’t see why everyones whining about using firefox for porn because of the private browsing.

item.title: Best browser?
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:34, topic:395923”][quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=493109.msg3605798#msg3605798 date=1306098026]
We’ll Firefox is AWESOME but so is Chrome, the thing about Chrome is that the in-built flashplayer is SO FUCKED up, it doesn’t display half the content I want, I tried reinstalling. So I’d say 50% Firefox because of the power and 50% Chrome because of the speed. I combine them both when using the world wide web.
[/quote]firefox for porn, chrome for everyday browsing.[/quote]
I think that’s exactly how he is combining them
OT: I switched to google Chrome, and It’s great

Read full topic

item.title: Best browser?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

chrome, i like not having a ton of toolbars, it is faster. look at chrome vs opera, chrome is way faster. the thing with chrome though is everything is a new process of chrome so if u have multiple plugin/extentions they are all running in ur processes. chrome users, if u didnt know put “about:flags”(w/o "s in ur address bar) lets u do extra stuff to ur browser, like prerendering pages. ff has options like that but idk what all u can do with its options.

u can use userscripts directly w/o the need of the greasemonkey plugin. the best browser is kind of an opinion, i mean what are u defining as “best” if u mean speed and browsing experience i would have to say chrome, b/c its my favorite out of all the ones ive tried.

Read full topic
